sdapy.snerun.snobject.bin_df¶

static snobject.bin_df(df, deltah=1.0, xkey='jdobs')¶

Bin dataframe. Will add one column, jdbin, into the input dataframe.

Parameters
dfpandas dataframe

snobject.lc

deltahfloat

binning factor, unit in days

xkeystr

jd key

HAFFET
